CustomField.description: The Syslog server logs should be posted to by the Logging Bridge. Server must support the TCP protocol and have TLS enabled. Papertrail is a popular choice for this.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Syslog server logs should be posted to by the Logging Bridge. Server must support the TCP protocol and have TLS enabled. Papertrail is a popular choice for this.
CustomField.label: Logging Server URL
